data.title: South Carolina Election Commission
data.meta_site_name: SC Votes - South Carolina Election Commission
data.text:
Results for November 7, 2023 Elections

Get results for State Senate 42 and most elections being held on Municipal Election Day.

Multi-county offices are on the main page.

Select county for all other offices.

Some results not included (see lists below).

The following elections have separate reporting pages due to being built on separate election databases.

City of Newberry

City of Greenville

Town of Surfside

City of Aiken

The following municipalities are not posting results to scVOTES.gov. Check locally for election results.

Any municipality in Chesterfield County

Any municipality in Greenville County (with the exception of the City of Greenville)

Any municipality in Horry County (with the exception of the Town of Surfside and the City of Loris)

Town of Iva (Anderson County)

Town of Jamestown (Berkeley County)

Town of Coward Special Election (Florence County)

Results for November 21, 2023 Municipal Runoffs

Get results for most municipal runoff elections being held on November 21.

Multi-county elections are on the main page.

Select county for all other elections.

Some results not included (see lists below).

Check under 2023 election results for results from November 7 elections.

The following elections have separate reporting pages due to being built on separate election databases.

City of Folly Beach (Charleston County)

City of Pickens (Pickens County)

Town of Central (Pickens County)

The following municipalities are not posting results to scVOTES.gov. Check locally for election results.

City of Simpsonville (Greenville County)

City of Myrtle Beach (Horry County)

Biennial Election Reports of the State Election Commission from 1968 to 2008. This report was discontinued after the 2008 report. All information previously published in these reports can now be found elsewhere on this site.
